site.title: Andy Brudtkuhl's Homepage
site.subtitle: Under Construction
site.banner: üöÄ WELCOME TO ANDY'S HOMEPAGE! üöÄ BEST VIEWED IN NETSCAPE NAVIGATOR! üöÄ

about.description: I'm a webmaster who has been building online since 1995. My first website was a fan site for Michael Jordan on Geocities.
about.description2: These days I work with Laravel.

projects.title: Tapback
projects.description: Tapback helps you get real-time micro feedback from users of your website or app. It's a simple tool and API that lets you customize emoji-based feedback forms and easily drop them on a website or app to start gathering valuable feedback.

projects.title: Snooji
projects.description: A modern web version of the classic Snood puzzle game, built with Laravel 12 and HTML5 Canvas. You launch emojis from a cannon, match three or more, and clear the board before the danger meter fills up.

projects.title: Site Spell Checker
projects.description: It's like grammarly for websites. I built an AI-powered proofreader that crawls websites and checks for spelling, grammar, and style issues and offers helpful suggestions for improvement.

projects.title: PMPrompt
projects.description: AI for product managers. The goal is simple - help PMs save time and be more effective by leveraging AI in their daily workflow. Features AI-Powered PRD Generator and PRD Reviewer.

projects.title: SurveySnaps
projects.description: A platform that makes collecting location-based feedback dead simple using QR codes. Help businesses gather real-time feedback from specific locations without the complexity of traditional survey tools.

projects.title: JSONL Tools
projects.description: A set of tools to help work with JSONL data. Features include a JSONL Validator to ensure the integrity and structure of JSONL data, plus other utilities for working with JSONL files.

projects.title: Make Storytime
projects.description: Personalized children's stories generated by AI. This is an app I am building with my kids to create custom bedtime stories and adventures.

projects.title: Fax Online
projects.description: There's a long tail for everything! An online fax service for people that need to send a fax online. Perfect for one-time fax needs without the hassle of traditional fax machines.

projects.title: Free URL Indexer
projects.description: A free tool to help you index your backlinks and get them into Google faster. Simple tool built to help with SEO efforts - no email required, just paste your URL and click the button.

projects.title: WordPressSharp
projects.description: Most popular C# library to work with the WordPress XML-RPC API. Open source library that makes it easy to interact with WordPress sites programmatically from .NET applications.

writing.title: Building Snooji
writing.description: A modern web version of the classic Snood puzzle game, built with Laravel 12 and HTML5 Canvas. Learn how to create engaging browser games using modern web technologies.

writing.title: JSONL Viewer Tool
writing.description: A practical tool for viewing and working with JSONL (JSON Lines) files. Perfect for data processing and analysis workflows.

writing.title: Building a Serverless Search Engine with Laravel and Cloudflare Vectorize
writing.description: Learn how to build a powerful search engine using Laravel and Cloudflare's Vectorize for AI-powered search capabilities without managing infrastructure.

writing.title: Building a Site Search Engine with Laravel and Meilisearch
writing.description: Create a fast and flexible search engine for your website using Laravel and Meilisearch. Perfect for adding search functionality to any Laravel application.

writing.title: Building a Laravel Cloud Pricing Calculator with Livewire
writing.description: Build an interactive pricing calculator using Laravel Livewire. Learn how to create dynamic, real-time user interfaces without writing JavaScript.

contact.message: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
